user_query: I want to organize a cocktail-making competition for my colleagues. Can you provide me with a list of cocktails and their recipes? Additionally, I need the details of all the NBA teams for designing team-themed cocktails.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of popular cocktails along with their recipes.
Retrieve details of all NBA teams, including team names and colors.
Design team-themed cocktails using the cocktails from step 1 and NBA team details from step 2.
